description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，第十三届全国人民代表大会广西壮族自治区代表。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a delegate of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广西壮族自治区玉林市下辖县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yulin City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关，任期由2018年至2023年。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, with a term from 2018 to 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.
Liu Ruyuan is from Bobai, Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 刘入源是中华人民共和国国籍。
description.en: Liu Ruyuan holds the nationality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘入源是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liu Ruyuan is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

position.en: Delegate from Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 2018年，刘入源被选为广西壮族自治区出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Liu Ruyuan was elected as a delegate from the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region to the 13th National People's Congress.
